originalText.text: Just had an amazing phone consult with Dr. Kessler. He’s the most lovely doctor. Felt very considered and felt better immediately. Can’t believe the effect he’s able to have remotely. Highly recommend. Total mensch.

text.text: Just had an amazing phone consult with Dr. Kessler. He’s the most lovely doctor. Felt very considered and felt better immediately. Can’t believe the effect he’s able to have remotely. Highly recommend. Total mensch.

originalText.text:
Literally ruined Julie Andrews's voice in 1997.
A quote by her in 2013:
Andrews admits that she has never recovered from the botched attempt to remove nodules from her vocal cords back in 1997. Her famous, four-octave soprano was then reduced to a fragile alto – she was quoted at the time as saying "I can sing the hell out of "Old Man River."[108]
Andrews sued Dr. Kessler.  The lawsuit was settled in September 2000 for an undisclosed amount.[142]

text.text:
Literally ruined Julie Andrews's voice in 1997.
A quote by her in 2013:
Andrews admits that she has never recovered from the botched attempt to remove nodules from her vocal cords back in 1997. Her famous, four-octave soprano was then reduced to a fragile alto – she was quoted at the time as saying "I can sing the hell out of "Old Man River."[108]
Andrews sued Dr. Kessler.  The lawsuit was settled in September 2000 for an undisclosed amount.[142]

originalText.text:
I work at the big opera house just around the corner from Dr KESSLER’s office. The rehearsal/ performance schedule can be overwhelming and very tiring ; it’s hard not to get sick sometimes when something is “ going around “ the group.
I can call Dr. Kesslers office, explain the situation to the extremely courteous and knowledgeable nurses and assistants there, and have an appointment within the next couple of hours!
Dr.Kessler himself is brilliant; he’s SEEN IT ALL! He is warm and intensely interested in the work he does. He is absolutely and completely focused on me, the patient, not just for a head cold, but asks questions that will inform him about my overall health, lifestyle, and the circumstances that have brought me to him that day. It’s the whole person as a unique voice/ character/ human that interests him. My favorite doc ever !

originalText.text: Dr. Kessler is absolutely amazing. I have gone from completely ill to singing well under pressure in less than 24 hours, more than once. I cannot live without my Dr. Kessler. Nope.

originalText.text: The best doctor I’ve ever had
